definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: contemn, spurn (NH id., Pi.; Targum [[נִיאוּחָא]] reviling);—

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pf. [[נִאֵץ]] Ps 10:3, Ps 10:13; [[נִאַ֫חְתָּ]] 2Sa 12:14, etc.; Impf. [[יְנׇאֵץ]] Ps 74:10; sf. [[יְנַאֲחֻנִי]] Nu 14:11; Inf. abs. [[נִאֵץ]] (Sta: § 221) 2Sa 12:14; Pt. sf. [[מְנָֽאֲחַי]] Nu 14:23; [[מְנַאֲחַי]] Je 23:17; [[מְנַאֲחָָיִח]] Is 60:14; —contemn, spurn, subj. men, obj. ´[[י]], etc.: Nu 14:11, Nu 14:23, Nu 16:30 (all J), De 31:20, De 1:4 Ps 10:3, Ps 10:13, Je 23:17; obj. ´[[שֵׁם י]] Ps 74:10, Ps 74:18; ´[[אִמְרַת י]] Is 5:24; ´[[מִנְחַת י]] 1Sa 2:17; once obj. Jerus. Is 60:14; cause to contemn (blaspheme AV RV) 2Sa 12:14, 2Sa 12:14 (but [[אׂיְבֵי]] prob. interp.; v. Comm).

definitions.title: Hithpo(el
definitions.body: Pt. [[כל־היום שְׁמִי מִנּׁאָץ]] Is 52:5 every day is my name contemned.
